properties.body:
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL 150159Z DEC
   BY M/V SANCO STAR AND M/V OCEAN EUROPE
   TOWING THREE 200 METER LONG CABLES
   IN AREA BOUND BY
   22-17.45S 040-02.10W, 22-22.18S 039-54.47W,
   22-26.05S 039-57.22W, 22-21.43S 040-04.68W.
   SEVEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 150259Z DEC 12.
